8.details:
1. Create water_log database table with user_id, date, amount_ml, timestamp
2. Build water intake logging interface with quick-add buttons (250ml, 500ml, 750ml, custom)
3. Add daily/weekly water goal tracking with progress bars
4. Create water consumption charts and trends
5. Add hydration reminders and daily targets
6. Integrate with overall health dashboard

9.details:

3. Implement achievement badges (7-day workout streak, 30-day sleep consistency, etc.)
4. Add progress indicators and milestone celebrations
5. Create achievements dashboard with unlocked/locked badges
6. Add streak recovery suggestions and motivation features

10.details:
1. Create health_score calculation algorithm based on sleep, nutrition, exercise, and hydration
2. Implement weighted scoring system (Sleep: 25%, Exercise: 25%, Nutrition: 25%, Water: 25%)
3. Add Health Score display on dashboard with color-coded indicators
4. Create historical Health Score trends and improvements
5. Add personalized recommendations based on Health Score patterns
6. Include Health Score in monthly summaries

12.details:
